TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityMarkupSerializer extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services for an at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
ActivityMarkupSerializer provides methods that serialize activity class objects into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into activity class objects. These services are primarily used by activity designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface.
For more information about serialization, see [Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnAfterSerialize (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnAfterSerialize(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The that manages the serialization process.
Docs.summary: Notifies the that an object has just been serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OnAfterSerialize is called immediately after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs and performs post-serialization processing on `obj`, primarily formatting and indenting code and extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) in the .xoml file.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnBeforeSerialize (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBeforeSerialize(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager serializationManager, object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The that manages the serialization process.
Docs.summary: Notifies the that an object is about to be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs on the activity specified by `obj`. OnBeforeSerialize writes the opening extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) tag for the activity, including any required attributes.

Docs.exception: , , or contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Docs.summary: The index of the first character in the activity definition.
The index of the first line in the activity definition.
